name: Thats Lit - Dude Perfect
description:
Flip the bottle as many times in a row as you can and get lit!

Swipe up on the bottle to flip. The longer the swipe, the higher the bottle. Tap anywhere on the screen midair to stop the bottle spin to nail the perfect landing!

Collect coins to unlock different bottles. Better Bottle = More Spins!

How many flips can you get?!
